section.title: Configure Backup
section.para: If your site is registered to receive remote, nightly backups of the data stored on your server, you will need to identify the default Account name to be used during backups. To configure your system for remote server backup, select the "Configure Backups" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Remote, nightly backups are provided to Customers who have signed a Remote Management Support agreement.

listitem.para: The Account name entered is the user name for your Account on the remote backup server.
